container.command_line: /bin/sh -c apk add --no-cache busybox-extras curl wget stress-ng iproute2 iperf3 &&     echo '=== Container Metrics Simulator Starting ===' &&     while true; do       echo "▶ Cycle Start: $(date)";       echo '1. CPU Load Test (30s sustained)';       stress-ng --cpu 2 --timeout 30s --metrics-brief & CPU_PID=$!; sleep 30; wait $CPU_PID || true;       echo '2. Memory Allocation Test (100MB allocation)';       stress-ng --vm 1 --vm-bytes 100M --timeout 20s & MEM_PID=$!; sleep 20; wait $MEM_PID || true;       echo '3. Disk I/O Operations (read + write)';       for i in $(seq 1 10); do dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/testfile$i bs=1M count=50 oflag=dsync 2>/dev/null; dd if=/tmp/testfile$i of=/dev/null bs=1M 2>/dev/null; rm -f /tmp/testfile$i; done;       echo '4. Network Traffic Generation (RX + TX)';       for j in $(seq 1 20); do wget -q -O /dev/null https://www.google.com 2>/dev/null || curl -s -o /dev/null https://www.google.com || true; sleep 0.5; done & WGET_PID=$!;       ping -c 100 -i 0.2 8.8.8.8 > /dev/null 2>&1 & PING_PID=$!;       sleep 15; kill $WGET_PID $PING_PID 2>/dev/null || true; wait $WGET_PID $PING_PID 2>/dev/null || true;       echo '5. Simulate Network Drops (20% loss for 10s)';       tc qdisc add dev eth0 root netem loss 20% delay 100ms 2>/dev/null || true;       ping -c 50 -i 0.2 8.8.8.8 > /dev/null 2>&1 || true;       tc qdisc del dev eth0 root 2>/dev/null || true;       echo '6. CPU Throttling Simulation';       stress-ng --cpu 4 --timeout 10s --metrics-brief 2>/dev/null || true;       echo '✓ Cycle Complete. Cooldown 20s...';       sleep 20;     done
container.image.name: alpine:latest
container.name: sim-metrics
description: CPU limit set for the container.
host.name: test.us-east-2.compute.internal
otel.library.name: otelcol/dockerstatsreceiver

container.image.name: alpine:latest
container.name: sim-metrics
